description:
While Satsuki recovers from his injuries in hospital, his replacement hasn`t exactly impressed those in charge at Belsorriso, leading their eyes to be cast in the direction of Haruka.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Onaji Ana no Mujina-tachi: Y`know What Makes a Fast Driver?
同じ穴のムジナたち -Y’know what makes a fast driver?-
